translations: n．扩大，放大：尺寸、规模、范围等的增加。
· The enlargements of the photographs were very impressive.
照片的放大效果非常令人印象深刻。

sentences.sentence: Ordering reprints and enlargements is easier than ever.
sentences.translation: 按需加洗和放大照片比以前要容易。

sentences.sentence: Develop is only cheaper when you're doing a lot of enlargements.
sentences.translation: 当你做了一些放大工作之后，冲洗费只会更便宜。

sentences.sentence: No, I usually get my film developed at a photo studio. But I make my own enlargements.
sentences.translation: 没有，我经常到照相馆冲洗照片。但是我自己放大相片。
